titleStmt.title: Fire in the bush The spirit bvrning, not consuming but purging mankinde, or, The great battell of God Almighty between Michaell, the seed of life, and the great red dragon, the curse fought within the spirit of man : with severall other declarations and testimonies of the power of life / by Jerrard Winstanly.
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, Gerrard, b. 1609.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
